catalog.description: Swarm A characteristics of the plasma density and plasma irregularities

parameters.description: Plasma density, directly copied from the Langmuir probe files.
parameters.name: Ne

parameters.description: Background density, as calculated from Ne using a percentile filter of 551 datapoints (2 Hz raw data) and 35 as the percentile.
parameters.name: Background_Ne

parameters.description: Foreground density, as calculated from ndens using a percentile filter of 7 datapoints (2 Hz raw data) and 50 as the percentile.
parameters.name: Foreground_Ne

parameters.description: Electron temperature, directly copied from the Langmuir probe files.
parameters.name: Te

parameters.description: The polar cap patch flag:  0 if the plasma density measurement occurred OUTSIDE a polar cap patch. 1 if the plasma density measurement occurred at one of the edges of a polar cap patch (no plasma velocity measurements are available). 2 if the plasma density measurement occurred at the LEADING edge of a polar cap patch. 3 if the plasma density measurement occurred at the TRAILING edge of a polar cap patch. 4 if the plasma density measurement occurred INSIDE a polar cap patch proper. When no ion drift data is available, the leading and trailing edges cannot be distinguished. In this case the polar cap patch flag is set to 4 throughout the patch proper and to 1 throughout both edges.
parameters.name: PCP_flag

parameters.description: The electron density gradient in a running window calculated via linear regression over 27 data points for the 2 Hz electron density data.
parameters.name: Grad_Ne_at_100km

parameters.description: The electron density gradient in a running window calculated via linear regression over 13 data points for the 2 Hz electron density data.
parameters.name: Grad_Ne_at_50km

parameters.description: The electron density gradient in a running window calculated via linear regression over 5 data points for the 2 Hz electron density data.
parameters.name: Grad_Ne_at_20km

parameters.description: The linear electron density gradient calculated over the edges of a patch. This variable is non-zero only at the edges of polar cap patches.
parameters.name: Grad_Ne_at_PCP_edge

parameters.description: Rate Of change of Density Index (RODI) is the standard deviation of ROD over 10 seconds.
parameters.name: RODI10s

parameters.description: Rate Of change of Density Index (RODI) is the standard deviation of ROD over 20 seconds.
parameters.name: RODI20s

parameters.description: Derived by subtracting Ne by its median filtered value in 10 seconds. As a result, delta_Ne10s indicates the electron density fluctuations smaller than 75 km.
parameters.name: delta_Ne10s

parameters.description: Derived by subtracting Ne by its median filtered value in 20 seconds. As a result, delta_Ne20s indicates the electron density fluctuations smaller than 150 km.
parameters.name: delta_Ne20s

parameters.description: Derived by subtracting Ne by its median filtered value in 40 seconds. As a result, delta_Ne40s indicates the electron density fluctuations smaller than 300 km.
parameters.name: delta_Ne40s

parameters.description: Total number of tracked GPS satellites above 20 degrees.
parameters.name: Num_GPS_satellites

parameters.description: Median of VTEC from all available GPS satellites above 30 degrees.
parameters.name: mVTEC

parameters.description: Median of Rate Of change of TEC (ROT) from all available GPS satellites above 30 degrees.
parameters.name: mROT

parameters.description: Median of Rate Of change of TEC Index (ROTI) from all available GPS satellites above 30 degrees. The ROTI of each satellite is the standard deviation of ROT over 10 seconds.
parameters.name: mROTI10s

parameters.description: Median of Rate Of change of TEC Index (ROTI) from all available GPS satellites above 30 degrees. The ROTI of each satellite is the standard deviation of ROT over 20 seconds.
parameters.name: mROTI20s

parameters.description: Plasma Bubble Index, copied from the level-2 Ionospheric Bubble Index product, IBIxTMS_2F.
parameters.name: IBI_flag

parameters.description: 0: equator, 1: mid-latitudes; 2: auroral oval; 3: polar cap.
parameters.name: Ionosphere_region_flag

parameters.description: The numeric index for plasma fluctuations and irregularities: 0-3 low, 4-5 medium, and > 6 high level of ionosphericplasma irregularities.
parameters.name: IPIR_index

parameters.description: STD of VTEC from all GPS satellites.

parameters.description: Derived by subtracting Ne by its median filtered value in 10 seconds. As a result, delta_Ne10s indicates the electron density fluctuations smaller than 75 km.
parameters.name: delta_Ne10s

parameters.description: Derived by subtracting Ne by its median filtered value in 20 seconds. As a result, delta_Ne20s indicates the electron density fluctuations smaller than 150 km.
parameters.name: delta_Ne20s

parameters.description: Derived by subtracting Ne by its median filtered value in 40 seconds. As a result, delta_Ne40s indicates the electron density fluctuations smaller than 300 km.
parameters.name: delta_Ne40s

parameters.description: Total number of tracked GPS satellites above 20 degrees.

parameters.description: Median of VTEC from all available GPS satellites above 30 degrees.

parameters.name: mROT

parameters.name: mROTI10s

parameters.description: Median of Rate Of change of TEC Index (ROTI) from all available GPS satellites above 30 degrees. The ROTI of each satellite is the standard deviation of ROT over 20 seconds.
parameters.name: mROTI20s

parameters.description: Plasma Bubble Index, copied from the level-2 Ionospheric Bubble Index product, IBIxTMS_2F.

parameters.description: The numeric index for plasma fluctuations and irregularities: 0-3 low, 4-5 medium, and > 6 high level of ionosphericplasma irregularities.

parameters.description: STD of VTEC from all GPS satellites.
